content.description:
Directions: Each of the questions or incomplete statements below is followed by four suggested answers or completions. Select the one that is best in each case.

The next questions refer to the 1932 German political poster below.

TRANSLATION:

“Women! Millions of men without work; millions of children without a future.

Save the German family—vote Adolf Hitler!”
content.question: The poster is most clearly evidence for which of the following trends in the period it was printed?

choices.label: The impact of Expressionism on advertising
The impact of the Bolshevik Revolution
The exploitation of economic suffering to promote radical politics
The increasing role of women as political leaders

content.answer: The exploitation of economic suffering to promote radical politics

skill.text: Skill 2.B: Explain the point of view, purpose, historical situation, and/or audience of a source.
